page.title: 10CORSTON GUEST HOUSE
page.content: This house is owned by Frederick Hiams Ltd, and is leased by Mr. and Mrs. Dorman. It is an 18th century Georgian Manor House with beds, food and drink. When full it caters for 36 people. On winter evenings the bar has about 6 to 30 customers and the Guest House is used by about 6 to 10. In summer the Guest House is nearly full and the bar has 40 to 50 customers. In winter the Dormans work on their own but in summer they take on extra staff, 2 full and 2 part-time. The best months are July and August, with September fairly good, but November to February is a quiet time. Locals support the bar all year round, with tourists needing bar meals and drinks in summer. Residents use a pool-table, a jukebox and arcade games. There is a piano and organ for special occasions.
